167099bf-f2d9-430a-92aa-3c0c8ffc92fe.description: Earners of the SIIM BP SITE – Participant badge have a foundational understanding of the Body Part Standardized Imaging Terminology challenges facing the imaging healthcare environment. They participate in focused conversations among the vendor, provider, and research professional fields related to anatomical labeling. Earners can provide input on how the various medical imaging specialties are working to address cross-functional image labeling to better the healthcare enterprise.
167099bf-f2d9-430a-92aa-3c0c8ffc92fe.name: SIIM BP SITE – Participant

issuer.summary: issued by Society for Imaging Informatics in Medicine (SIIM)

entity.name: Society for Imaging Informatics in Medicine (SIIM)

badge_template_activities.title: Learner either participated in the "What's the Problem? The Importance of Anatomic Body Part Labeling" Webinar hosted on 3/25/2021 or reviewed the On-Demand Recording.

9aff826c-c820-4315-8bf2-eaf0ba7c8762.description: Earners of the SIIM Hackathon 2021 Winner Badge experienced first-hand how new and experienced coders build and test applications, collaborate on projects, and develop the next generation of applications and utilities. The winning team was selected based on the judge's votes for Best Project during the Hackathon 2021 event, 2021 #SIIMHacks. Judging Criteria includes the following categories: 1) innovation and originality, 2) practicality and usefulness, 3) utilization of APIs, and 4) Overall.
9aff826c-c820-4315-8bf2-eaf0ba7c8762.name: SIIM - Hackathon 2021 Winner

33cc7047-981d-44c9-8e36-455c9a472133.description: Hosted in conjunction with RSNA, earners of the NIIC-RAD Course Graduate Badge have a fundamental understanding of imaging informatics and practical concepts. They know and demonstrate a comprehensive application of introductory informatics principles, including the role of standards, computers, networking, and PACS & archives. These graduates can discuss and promote the role of imaging informatics within radiology.
33cc7047-981d-44c9-8e36-455c9a472133.name: SIIM - NIIC-RAD Course Graduate

issuer.summary: issued by Society for Imaging Informatics in Medicine (SIIM)

entity.name: Society for Imaging Informatics in Medicine (SIIM)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the required NIIC-RAD course curriculum, to include all prework, homework, and lecture assignments.
Score a passing grade on the NIIC-RAD final exam, demonstrating sufficient understanding of course content and topics.
